title: View Differences in Changes
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `git diff` command to view the differences between your local changes and the last commit in a Git repository.

meta.title: Mastering Git Diffs
meta.description: Explore the power of Git's difference tracking feature to streamline your development workflow.
meta.keywords: version control, code changes, git labs, comparison, git, diff, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
